Removing Promotion Groups

Remove a promotion group from a revision whenever the promotion group is no longer needed or necessary. You are not actually removing a promotion group from a promotion model, you are simply removing the promotion group from a revision.

NOTE Even if you remove a promotion group from a revision, as long as a promotion model is in effect for your project database, every time you check out a revision it will be associated with the lowest-level promotion group.

You can remove promotion groups by selecting a revision, a single versioned file, multiple versioned files, a project, a folder, or a project database.

Using the System Default Options

Unless your Administrator changed the defaults for the project's configuration, when you remove a promotion group assigned to a versioned file, Version Manager:

  • Uses the first development group in the Promotion Group field.
  • Does not remove the promotion group assigned to files in subprojects.

To remove a promotion group:

  1. Select the item that has been assigned the promotion group you want to remove.

  2. Select Actions | Promotion Group | Remove. The Remove Promotion Group dialog box appears.

  3. Accept the defaults listed above and click OK, or do the following:

    1. To override the defaults on the General tab, edit any of the fields described below:

      To... Do this...
      Choose the promotion group to be removed Select the promotion group from the Promotion Group list box.
      Remove the promotion group from all files in subprojects Select the Include files in subprojects check box. This field is available only if the item which you selected to remove the promotion group from is a project or project database.


    2. To review the selected files:

      To... Do this...
      View which items will have the selected promotion group removed Click the Selected Files tab.
      View the properties of the items selected for promotion group removal Select the versioned file and click the Properties button.


  4. Click OK. The promotion group is removed from the selected project or files.
